com.team2.shopperhelper
Class SearchProduct

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.team2.shopperhelper.SearchProduct

public class SearchProduct
extends Activity

Searching for a Product.

Since:
7/12/2012 Instructor: Karl Lloyd
Class: IT482
University: Colorado Technical University
Source Cite: http://developer.android.com/guide/components/index.html
This activity is set to retrieve customer information from the user interface. Once this is done, it will go through a validation process, and get passed onto the web parsing and listing process. This activity is set to retrieve customer information from the user interface. Once this is done, it will go through a validation process, and get passed onto the web parsing and listing process...
Version:
0.5.2
Author:
Dana Haywood

          Allows the Activity to change between different search types.

Field Detail

PREF_NAME

public static final java.lang.String PREF_NAME
Setting up a value for Shared Preferences to store the query type and value.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

productLbl

private TextView productLbl
This is the default label with "Enter Info". This will be set to gone if product type search is selected.

productTypeLbl

private TextView productTypeLbl
This is primary to make the label visible if a Product Type search is to be done. This way the text is relevant to what being search. It looks a little ridiculous to enter info when it is a drop down box.

productTXT

private EditText productTXT
The Editbox for the Product Name.

UPCTXT

private EditText UPCTXT
The Editbox for the UPC

productType

private Spinner productType
The Spinner to declare a product type.

searchType

private Spinner searchType
Allows the Activity to change between different search types.

search

private ImageButton search
The button to take the values received, save it to the preferences, and go to ShowProduct.

info

private ImageButton info
The button to activate the In-App help system.

clear

private ImageButton clear
This will clear all the values and restore than back to the defaults.

back

private ImageButton back
This will send the activity to the previous activity.

intent

private Intent intent
The intent set for ShowProduct activity.

previous

private Intent previous
The intent set for Search for Store activity.

settings

private SharedPreferences settings
The settings for the SharedPreferences, which saves the information into Internal Storage.

editor

private Editor editor
The editor that will store information into internal storage. The Search Type and Search Value.

newActivity

protected void newActivity(Intent intent,
                           EditText productTXT,
                           Spinner searchType,
                           EditText uPCTXT)
Resetting the display as well as starting the new activity.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent that will start the new activity
productTXT - the edit box for product name
searchType - the spinner for product type
uPCTXT - the edit box for UPC.

querySave

protected void querySave(java.lang.String valueA,
                         java.lang.String valueB,
                         Editor editor)
Saving information to preference

Parameters:
valueA - the value for queryType
valueB - the value for queryValue
editor - the editor to commit this to pref.
